stay in touch, out of sight.

gravitāte allows our users to roam free, yet be connected.

gravitāte is...

meet up anywhere

instead of having a set meet-up destination, choose any member of your group to be the planet that keeps everyone together.

stay in touch

you can send notifications, pictures, and messages to keep group members up to date.

all in one app

we made life a bit easier by incorporating our needs of communication in our app.
